verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Knees to the earth
That You breathed by Your word
As You watched the darkness come
Crushed by the weight of the cost
As You prayed, "Not my will but Yours be done"
Gethsemane, where Heaven met me

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Redeemer, crowned in endless praise
My Savior, name above all names
King Jesus
take the highest place

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
There on the hill,
You surrendered Your will
For they know not what they do"
Grief in Your heart,
Your hands bear the scars
of a love that led You to the tomb
Calvary, where Heaven met me

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Redeemer, crowned in endless praise
My Savior, name above all names
King Jesus
take the highest place

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Oh, the power of the cross
Oh, the power of Your blood
Oh, the power of the cross
Oh, the power of Your blood
Oh, the power of the cross
Oh, the power of Your blood

verse.name: c3
verse.lines:
Oh darkness,
You have lost Your strength
Oh Hell, You lost everything
King Jesus
take the highest place

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Oh, the power of the cross
Oh, the power of Your blood
Oh, the power of the cross
Oh, the power of Your blood
